GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
tcp/dccp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_fwmark_accept.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit bf3134feffe61b7a0e21f60a04743f8da0958b53, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 84f39b08d7868ce10eeaf640627cb89777f0ae93. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp/dccp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_fwmark_accept.
